    • Method Detail

      • addRelation

        public <T extends IGeoObject> void addRelation(java.lang.String tableName,
                                      TableDefinition tableDef,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> pGeoObjectClass)
                 throws DBManagerException
        Description copied from class: DBManager
        Adds a new relation (table) to the database. The also given class is registered. If there is already a table with the same name in this database it is assumed that the table already exists.
        Specified by:
        addRelation in interface IDBManager
        Overrides:
        addRelation in class DBManager
        Parameters:
        tableName - name of the relation (table)
        pGeoObjectClass - Class of the GeoObject (implements IGeoObject) which should be stored in the new table
        Throws:
        DBManagerException
